016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.server.resources;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.InstanceConfiguration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.*;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.server.resources.JsonApiResource;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api.ServiceResourceObjects;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api.ServiceResourceObject;
024import jakarta.inject.Inject;
025import jakarta.ws.rs.GET;
026import jakarta.ws.rs.Path;
027
028@Path( "/" )
029public class ServerResource
030        extends JsonApiResource
031{
032    private ServiceResourceObjects serviceResourceObjects;
033    private Configuration configuration;
034
035    @Inject
036    public ServerResource(ServiceResourceObjects serviceResourceObjects, Configuration configuration)
037    {
038        this.serviceResourceObjects = serviceResourceObjects;
039        this.configuration = configuration;
040    }
041
042    @GET
043    public ResourceDocument get()
044    {
045        InstanceConfiguration standardConfiguration = new InstanceConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("instance"));
046
047        ResourceObjects.Builder builder = new ResourceObjects.Builder();
048        for (ServiceResourceObject serviceResource : serviceResourceObjects.getServiceResources()) {
049            builder.resource(serviceResource.resourceObject());
050        }
051        ResourceDocument serverDocument = new ResourceDocument.Builder()
052                .links(new Links.Builder().link(JsonApiRels.self, standardConfiguration.getURI()).build())
053                .meta(new Meta.Builder()
054                        .meta("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis())
055                        .build())
056                .data(builder.build())
057                .build();
058        return serverDocument.resolve(getBaseUri());
059    }
060}
